meta.title: From GROUND to HOG
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: Okay, campers, rise and shine, and don't forget your booties 'cause it's cooooold out there today! That’s right, woodchuck-chuckers, it’s [GROUNDHOG DAY](/2026/02/02)!
